simulation.agent

Interface WeightedLexiconAgent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Agent, Listener, Speaker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SuccessCountingAgent

    public interface WeightedLexiconAgent
extends Agent
    An interface providing all methods expected to be defined for agents with weighted lexicons.
    See Also:
    Agent, WeightedLexicon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<Language,java.lang.Double> countWeightSums(java.util.Collection<Language> languages)
      Returns a map from the given collection of languages to numbers such that each language is mapped to sum of weights of words from this agent's lexicon belonging to this language.
      static java.util.Map<Language,java.lang.Double> countWeightSums(java.util.Collection<Language> languages, Agent[] agents)
      Returns a map from the given collection of languages to numbers such that each language is mapped to sum of weights of words from the lexicons of the agents from the given array, beloning to this language.

      • Methods inherited from interface simulation.agent.Agent

        countDominatingWords, countRecognizedThings, countUsers, dominatingLanguage, lexicallySynchronized, lexicallySynchronized, oneToOneLexicon, oneToOneLexicons, recognized, recognizedThings

      • Methods inherited from interface simulation.agent.Speaker

        loss, randomRecognizedThing, signal, success

      • Methods inherited from interface simulation.agent.Listener

        acquire, loss, recognized, success

    • Method Detail

      • countWeightSums

        java.util.Map<Language,java.lang.Double> countWeightSums(java.util.Collection<Language> languages)
        Returns a map from the given collection of languages to numbers such that each language is mapped to sum of weights of words from this agent's lexicon belonging to this language.
        Parameters:
        languages - a collection of languages to be a domain of returned map
        Returns:
        a map from the given collection of languages to numbers such that each language is mapped to sum of weights of words from this agent's lexicon belonging to this language.

      • countWeightSums

        static java.util.Map<Language,java.lang.Double> countWeightSums(java.util.Collection<Language> languages,
                                                                Agent[] agents)
        Returns a map from the given collection of languages to numbers such that each language is mapped to sum of weights of words from the lexicons of the agents from the given array, beloning to this language.
        Parameters:
        languages - a collection of languages to be a domain of returned map
        agents - an array of agents to be included in evaluation of the mappings to sums of weights
        Returns:
        a map from the given collection of languages to numbers such that each language is mapped to sum of weights of words from the lexicons of the agents from the given array, beloning to this language.
